text:
Hello Sadiki,

As of my last knowledge but not completely sure, Within a public app, you can create custom CRM cards to display information from other systems on HubSpot. Each app can include up to 25 CRM cards.
But, For UI Extensions you need  Sales Hub (Enterprise) and Service Hub (Enterprise). Also, you can cross check with the help on information provided on following links.

Custom cards - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/crm-cards>
UI Extensions - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extensions-overview>
